short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the dreaded Boing Boing Shop and Sponsor posts from boingboing.net

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
